markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Standard">[Telekinetic Haul](/Spells.aspx?ID=332)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 377 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Target** 1 unattended object of up to 80 Bulk with no dimension longer than 20 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You move the target up to 20 feet, potentially suspending it in midair. When you Sustain the Spell, you can do so again, or you can choose a different eligible target to move.
name: Telekinetic Haul

</summary>
target: 1 unattended object of up to 80 Bulk with no dimension longer than 20 feet

text: Telekinetic Haul Source Core Rulebook pg. 377 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 120 feet Target 1 unattended object of up to 80 Bulk with no dimension longer than 20 feet Duration sustained up to 1 minute --- You move the target up to 20 feet, potentially suspending it in midair. When you Sustain the Spell, you can do so again, or you can choose a different eligible target to move.
